member.summary: Text that needs to be rendered (null if the action type is ). If you change this, you need to invalidate the 's visual.

member.summary: Rendering stroke (null if the action type is or if the rendered action only has a ). If you change this, you need to invalidate the 's visual.

member.summary: Rendering fill (null if the rendered action only has a ). If you change this, you need to invalidate the 's visual.

member.name: M:VectSharp.Canvas.RenderAction.PathAction(Avalonia.Media.Geometry,Avalonia.Media.Pen,Avalonia.Media.IBrush,Avalonia.Matrix,Avalonia.Media.Geometry,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new representing a path.
member.param: The geometry to be rendered.
The stroke of the path (can be null).
The fill of the path (can be null).
The transform that will be applied to the path.
The clipping path.
A tag to access the . If this is null this is not visible in the hit test.
member.returns: A new representing a path.

member.summary: Creates a new representing text.
member.param: The text to be rendered.
The fill of the text (can be null).
The transform that will be applied to the text.
The clipping path.
A tag to access the . If this is null this is not visible in the hit test.
member.returns: A new representing text.

The source rectangle of the image.
The destination rectangle of the image.
The transform that will be applied to the image.
The clipping path.

member.name: M:VectSharp.Canvas.RenderAction.BringToFront
member.summary: Brings the render action to the front of the rendering queue. This method can only be invoked after the output has been fully initialised.

member.name: M:VectSharp.Canvas.RenderAction.SendToBack
member.summary: Brings the render action to the back of the rendering queue. This method can only be invoked after the output has been fully initialised.

member.name: T:VectSharp.Canvas.AvaloniaContextInterpreter
member.summary: Contains methods to render a to an .

member.name: T:VectSharp.Canvas.AvaloniaContextInterpreter.TextOptions
member.summary: Defines whether text items should be converted into paths when drawing.

member.name: F:VectSharp.Canvas.AvaloniaContextInterpreter.TextOptions.AlwaysConvert
member.summary: Converts all text items into paths.

member.name: F:VectSharp.Canvas.AvaloniaContextInterpreter.TextOptions.ConvertIfNecessary
member.summary: Converts all text items into paths, with the exception of those that use a standard font.

member.name: F:VectSharp.Canvas.AvaloniaContextInterpreter.TextOptions.NeverConvert
member.summary: Does not convert any text items into paths.

member.name: M:VectSharp.Canvas.AvaloniaContextInterpreter.PaintToCanvas(VectSharp.Page,VectSharp.Canvas.AvaloniaContextInterpreter.TextOptions,VectSharp.Canvas.FilterOption)
member.summary: Render a to an .
member.param: The to render.
Defines whether text items should be converted into paths when drawing.
Defines how and whether image filters should be rasterised when rendering the image.
member.returns: An containing the rendered graphics objects.

member.name: M:VectSharp.Canvas.AvaloniaContextInterpreter.PaintToCanvas(VectSharp.Page,System.Boolean,VectSharp.Canvas.AvaloniaContextInterpreter.TextOptions,VectSharp.Canvas.FilterOption)
member.summary: Render a to an .
member.param: The to render.

If this is true, each graphics object (e.g. paths, text...) is rendered as a separate . Otherwise, they are directly rendered onto the drawing context (which is faster, but does not allow interactivity).
Defines whether text items should be converted into paths when drawing.
Defines how and whether image filters should be rasterised when rendering the image.
member.returns: An containing the rendered graphics objects.

member.name: M:VectSharp.Canvas.AvaloniaContextInterpreter.PaintToCanvas(VectSharp.Page,System.Boolean,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Delegate},System.Boolean,VectSharp.Canvas.AvaloniaContextInterpreter.TextOptions,VectSharp.Canvas.FilterOption)
member.summary: Render a to an .
member.param: The to render.

If this is true, each graphics object (e.g. paths, text...) is rendered as a separate . Otherwise, they are directly rendered onto the drawing context (which is faster, but does not allow interactivity).

A containing the s that will be performed on items with the corresponding tag. If is true, the delegates should be voids that accept one parameter of type or (depending on the tagged item), otherwise, they should accept one parameter of type and return an of the actions that will actually be performed.
Whether the s should be removed from after their execution. Set to false if the same should be performed on multiple items with the same tag.
Defines whether text items should be converted into paths when drawing.
Defines how and whether image filters should be rasterised when rendering the image.
member.returns: An containing the rendered graphics objects.

member.name: M:VectSharp.Canvas.AvaloniaContextInterpreter.PaintToCanvas(VectSharp.Page,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Delegate},System.Boolean,VectSharp.Canvas.AvaloniaContextInterpreter.TextOptions,VectSharp.Canvas.FilterOption)
member.summary: Render a to an .
member.param: The to render.
A containing the s that will be performed on items with the corresponding tag. The delegates should accept one parameter of type or (depending on the tagged item).
Whether the s should be removed from after their execution. Set to false if the same should be performed on multiple items with the same tag.
Defines whether text items should be converted into paths when drawing.
Defines how and whether image filters should be rasterised when rendering the image.
member.returns: An containing the rendered graphics objects.

member.name: M:VectSharp.Canvas.AvaloniaContextInterpreter.PaintToAnimatedCanvas(VectSharp.Animation,System.Double,System.Double,VectSharp.Canvas.AvaloniaContextInterpreter.TextOptions,VectSharp.Canvas.FilterOption)
member.summary: Render an to an .
member.param: The to render.
The target frame rate of the animation, in frames-per-second (fps).

A scaling factor that will be applied to all durations in the animation. Values greater than 1 slow down the animation, values smaller than 1 accelerate it. Note that this does not affect the frame rate of the animation.
Defines whether text items should be converted into paths when drawing.
Defines how and whether image filters should be rasterised when rendering the image.
member.returns: An containing the rendered animation.

member.name: T:VectSharp.Canvas.SKMultiLayerRenderCanvas
member.summary: Represents a multi-threaded, triple-buffered canvas on which the image is drawn using SkiaSharp.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Canvas.SKMultiLayerRenderCanvas.PageWidth
member.summary: The width of the page that is rendered on this canvas.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Canvas.SKMultiLayerRenderCanvas.PageHeight
member.summary: The height of the page that is rendered on this canvas.

member.name: F:VectSharp.Canvas.SKMultiLayerRenderCanvas.RenderActions
member.summary: The list of render actions, each element in this list is itself a list, containing the actions that correspond to a layer in the image.

member.name: F:VectSharp.Canvas.SKMultiLayerRenderCanvas.LayerTransforms
member.summary: The list of transforms associated with each layer.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Canvas.SKMultiLayerRenderCanvas.Spinner
member.summary: If the image to draw is not already cached, this method is called with an argument containing the number of milliseconds since the image was last rendered. The method can return a Bitmap that will be drawn on the canvas in order to let users know that the image is being rendered in background.

member.name: M:VectSharp.Canvas.SKMultiLayerRenderCanvas.#ctor(VectSharp.Document,VectSharp.Colour,System.Double,System.Double,System.Collections.Generic.List{VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderAction})
member.summary: Create a new SKMultiLayerRenderCanvas from a , where each page represents a layer.
member.param: The document containing the layers as s.

A list of transforms associated with each layer. This list should contain the same number of elements as the number of pages in . This is useful to manipulate the position of each layer individually. If this is null, an identity transform is applied to each layer.
The background colour of the canvas.
The width of the canvas and the pages it contains.
The height of the canvas and the pages it contains.

member.name: M:VectSharp.Canvas.SKMultiLayerRenderCanvas.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{VectSharp.Page},VectSharp.Colour,System.Double,System.Double,System.Collections.Generic.List{VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderAction})
member.summary: Create a new SKMultiLayerRenderCanvas from a collection of s, each representing a layer.
member.param: The contents of the canvas. Each element in this list represents a layer.

A list of transforms associated with each layer. This list should contain the same number of elements as . This is useful to manipulate the position of each layer individually. If this is null, an identity transform is applied to each layer.
The background colour of the canvas.
The width of the canvas and the pages it contains.
The height of the canvas and the pages it contains.

member.name: M:VectSharp.Canvas.SKMultiLayerRenderCanvas.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.List{VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderContext},System.Collections.Generic.List{VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderAction},VectSharp.Colour,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Create a new SKMultiLayerRenderCanvas from a list of SKRenderContexts, each representing a layer.
member.param: The contents of the canvas. Each element in this list represents a layer. A Page can be converded to a SKRenderContext through the CopyToSKRenderContext method.
A list of transforms associated with each layer. This list should contain the same number of elements as . This is useful to manipulate the position of each layer individually.
The background colour of the canvas.
The width of the canvas and the page it contains.
The height of the canvas and the page it contains.

member.name: M:VectSharp.Canvas.SKMultiLayerRenderCanvas.UpdateWith(System.Collections.Generic.List{VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderContext},System.Collections.Generic.List{VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderAction},VectSharp.Colour,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Replace the contents of the SKMultiLayerRenderCanvas with the specified layers.
member.param: The contents of the canvas. Each element in this list represents a layer. A Page can be converded to a SKRenderContext through the CopyToSKRenderContext method.
A list of transforms associated with each layer. This list should contain the same number of elements as . This is useful to manipulate the position of each layer individually.
The background colour of the canvas.
The width of the canvas and the page it contains.
The height of the canvas and the page it contains.

member.name: M:VectSharp.Canvas.SKMultiLayerRenderCanvas.UpdateLayer(System.Int32,VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderContext,VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderAction)
member.summary: Replace a single layer with the specified content.
member.param: The index of the layer to replace.
The new contents of the layer. A Page can be converded to a SKRenderContext through the CopyToSKRenderContext method.
The new transform for the layer.

member.name: M:VectSharp.Canvas.SKMultiLayerRenderCanvas.AddLayer(VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderContext,VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderAction)
member.summary: Add a new layer to the image.
member.param: The contents of the new layer. A Page can be converded to a SKRenderContext through the CopyToSKRenderContext method.
The transform for the new layer.

member.name: M:VectSharp.Canvas.SKMultiLayerRenderCanvas.InsertLayer(System.Int32,VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderContext,VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderAction)
member.summary: Insert a new layer at the specified index.
member.param: The position at which the new layer will be inserted.
The contents of the new layer.
The transform for the new layer.

member.name: M:VectSharp.Canvas.SKMultiLayerRenderCanvas.RemoveLayer(System.Int32)
member.summary: Remove the specified layer from the image.
member.param: The index of the layer to remove.

member.name: M:VectSharp.Canvas.SKMultiLayerRenderCanvas.SwitchLayers(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Switch the position of the two specified layers.
member.param: The index of the first layer to switch.
The index of the second layer to switch.

member.name: M:VectSharp.Canvas.SKMultiLayerRenderCanvas.MoveLayer(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Move the specified layer to the specified position, shifting all other layers as necessary.
member.param: The current index of the layer to move.
The final index of the layer. Layers after this will be shifted by 1 in order to accommodate the moved layer.

member.name: F:VectSharp.Canvas.SKMultiLayerRenderCanvas.RenderLock
member.summary: An lock for the rendering loop. The public methods of this class already lock on this, but you may need it if you want to directly manipulate the contents of the canvas.

member.name: M:VectSharp.Canvas.SKMultiLayerRenderCanvas.RenderAtResolution(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Nullable{SkiaSharp.SKColor})
member.summary: Render the image at to a bitmap at the specified resolution.
member.param: The width of the rendered image. Note that the actual width of the returned image might be lower than this, depending on the aspect ratio of the image.
The height of the rendered image. Note that the actual height of the returned image might be lower than this, depending on the aspect ratio of the image.
The background colour for the image. If this is , the current background colour is used.
member.returns: A containing the image rendered at the specified resolution.

member.name: M:VectSharp.Canvas.SKMultiLayerRenderCanvas.InvalidateDirty
member.summary: Invalidate the contents of the canvas, forcing it to redraw itself.

member.name: M:VectSharp.Canvas.SKMultiLayerRenderCanvas.InvalidateZIndex
member.summary: Invalidate the contents of the canvas, specifying that the order of the layers has changed.

member.summary: The render action represents rendering a graphics object with a filter.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderAction.ActionType
member.summary: Type of the rendering action.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderAction.Path
member.summary: Path that needs to be rendered (null if the action type is not ). If you change this, you probably want to call this object's method.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderAction.Text
member.summary: Text that needs to be rendered (null if the action type is not ). If you change this, you probably want to call this object's method.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderAction.Font
member.summary: The font that will be used to render the text (null if the action type is not ). If you change this, you probably want to call this object's method.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderAction.TextX
member.summary: The X coordainate at which the text will be drawn (null if the action type is not ). If you change this, you probably want to call this object's method.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderAction.TextY
member.summary: The Y coordainate at which the text will be drawn (null if the action type is not ). If you change this, you probably want to call this object's method.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderAction.Paint
member.summary: Paint used to render the text or path ( if the action type is neither nor ). If you change this, you probably want to call this object's method.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderAction.ImageId
member.summary: Univocal identifier of the image that needs to be drawn.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderAction.ImageSource
member.summary: The source rectangle of the image ( if the action type is not ). If you change this, you probably want to call this object's method.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderAction.ImageDestination
member.summary: The destination rectangle of the image ( if the action type is not ). If you change this, you probably want to call this object's method.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderAction.Transform
member.summary: The transformation matrix that will be applied to the current coordinate system ( if the action type is not ). If you change this, you probably want to call this object's method.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderAction.Tag
member.summary: A tag to access the .

member.name: P:VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderAction.ZIndex
member.summary: The Z-index of the rendering action (an action with a higher Z-index will always appear above an action with a lower Z-index). The more different values there are for the Z-index, the slower the rendering, so keep use of this property to a minimum. If you change this, you probably want to call this object's method.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderAction.Graphics
member.summary: The graphics that will be drawn with the specified . If you change this, you probably want to call this object's method.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderAction.Filter
member.summary: The filter with which the is drawn. If you change this, you probably want to call this object's method.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderAction.Payload
member.summary: An arbitrary object associated with the RenderAction.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderAction.Parent
member.summary: The container of this .

member.name: E:VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderAction.PointerEnter
member.summary: Raised when the pointer enters the area covered by the .

member.name: E:VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderAction.PointerLeave
member.summary: Raised when the pointer leaves the area covered by the .

member.name: E:VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderAction.PointerPressed
member.summary: Raised when the pointer is pressed while over the area covered by the .

member.name: E:VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderAction.PointerReleased
member.summary: Raised when the pointer is released after a event.

summary.para: Signals to this object that its shape has changed a new path needs to be computed for the purpose of hit-testing. Also signals to the that the visual properties of this object have changed and triggers a redraw.
This method should be called whenever the "shape" of the object represented by the changes. If only the visual properties of this object have changed (e.g. the colour), call the method instead.
If you make changes to more than one contained in the same , you only need to invalidate the last one.
This method should only be called after the output has been fully initialized.
This methods signals to the that the visual properties (e.g. the colour) of this object have changed and triggers a redraw.

If the "shape" of the object has changed as well, call the method instead. If the Z-index of the object has changed, call the method instead. If both the "shape" and the Z-index of the object have changed, call the method.
If you make changes to more than one contained in the same , you only need to invalidate the last one.
This method should only be called after the output has been fully initialized.
This methods signals to the that the Z-index and visual properties (e.g. the colour) of this object have changed and triggers a redraw.
If the "shape" of the object has changed as well, call the method instead.
If you make changes to more than one contained in the same , you only need to invalidate the last one.
This method should only be called after the output has been fully initialized.
This methods signals to the that the Z-index, shape and visual properties (e.g. the colour) of this object have changed and triggers a redraw.
If you make changes to more than one contained in the same , you only need to invalidate the last one.
This method should only be called after the output has been fully initialized.

member.name: T:VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderContext
member.summary: Represents a page that has been prepared for fast rendering using the SkiaSharp renderer.

member.name: T:VectSharp.Canvas.FilterOption
member.summary: Determines how and whether image filters are rasterised.

member.name: T:VectSharp.Canvas.FilterOption.FilterOperations
member.summary: Defines whether image filters should be rasterised or not.

member.name: F:VectSharp.Canvas.FilterOption.FilterOperations.RasteriseAllWithSkia
member.summary: Image filters will always be rasterised using the SkiaSharp backend.

member.name: F:VectSharp.Canvas.FilterOption.FilterOperations.RasteriseAllWithVectSharp
member.summary: Image filters will always be rasterised using the VectSharp.Raster or VectSharp.Raster.ImageSharp. This option requires a reference to VectSharp.Raster or to VectSharp.Raster.ImageSharp to be added.

member.name: F:VectSharp.Canvas.FilterOption.FilterOperations.IgnoreAll
member.summary: All image filters will be ignored.

member.name: F:VectSharp.Canvas.FilterOption.FilterOperations.SkipAll
member.summary: All the images that should be drawn with a filter will be ignored.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Canvas.FilterOption.Operation
member.summary: Defines whether image filters should be rasterised or not.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Canvas.FilterOption.RasterisationResolution
member.summary: The resolution that will be used to rasterise image filters. Depending on the value of , this can either be an absolute resolution (i.e. a size in pixel), or a scale factor that is applied to the image size in graphics units.

member.name: P:VectSharp.Canvas.FilterOption.RasterisationResolutionRelative
member.summary: Determines whether the value of is absolute (i.e. a size in pixel), or relative (i.e. a scale factor that is applied to the image size in graphics units).

member.name: F:VectSharp.Canvas.FilterOption.Default
member.summary: The default options for image filter rasterisation.

member.name: M:VectSharp.Canvas.FilterOption.#ctor(VectSharp.Canvas.FilterOption.FilterOperations,System.Double,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Create a new object.
member.param: Defines whether image filters should be rasterised or not.

The resolution that will be used to rasterise image filters. Depending on the value of , this can either be an absolute resolution (i.e. a size in pixel), or a scale factor that is applied to the image size in graphics units.
Determines whether the value of is absolute (i.e. a size in pixel), or relative (i.e. a scale factor that is applied to the image size in graphics units).

member.name: T:VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderContextInterpreter
member.summary: Contains methods to render a to an using the SkiaSharp renderer.

member.name: M:VectSharp.Canvas.SKRenderContextInterpreter.PaintToSKCanvas(VectSharp.Document,System.Nullable{System.Double},System.Nullable{System.Double},System.Nullable{VectSharp.Colour},VectSharp.Canvas.AvaloniaContextInterpreter.TextOptions,VectSharp.Canvas.FilterOption)
member.summary: Render a to an using the SkiaSharp renderer. Each page corresponds to a layer in the image.
member.param: The to render.
The width of the document. If this is , the width of the largest page is used.
The height of the document. If this is , the height of the largest page is used.
The background colour of the document. If this is , a transparent background is used.
Defines whether text items should be converted into paths when drawing.
Defines how and whether image filters should be rasterised when rendering the image.
member.returns: An containing the rendered graphics objects.

member.summary: Render a to an using the SkiaSharp renderer. Each page corresponds to a layer in the image.
member.param: The to render.

A Dictionary containing the actions that will be performed on items with the corresponding tag. These should be functions that accept one parameter of type and return an of the render actions that will actually be added to the plot.
Whether the actions should be removed from after their execution. Set to false if the same action should be performed on multiple items with the same tag.
The width of the document. If this is , the width of the largest page is used.
The height of the document. If this is , the height of the largest page is used.
The background colour of the document. If this is , a transparent background is used.
Defines whether text items should be converted into paths when drawing.
Defines how and whether image filters should be rasterised when rendering the image.
member.returns: An containing the rendered graphics objects.

member.summary: Render a to an using the SkiaSharp renderer. Each page corresponds to a layer in the image.
member.param: The to render.

A Dictionary containing the actions that will be performed on items with the corresponding tag. These should be functions that accept one parameter of type and return an of the render actions that will actually be added to the plot.

A dictionary that associates to each raster image path (or data URL) the image rendered as a and a boolean value indicating whether it should be drawn as "pixelated" or not. This will be populated automatically as the page is rendered. If you are rendering multiple s (or you are rendering the same page multiple times), it will be beneficial to keep a reference to this dictionary and pass it again on further rendering requests; otherwise, you can just pass an empty dictionary.
Whether the actions should be removed from after their execution. Set to false if the same action should be performed on multiple items with the same tag.
The width of the document. If this is , the width of the largest page is used.
The height of the document. If this is , the height of the largest page is used.
The background colour of the document. If this is , a transparent background is used.
Defines whether text items should be converted into paths when drawing.
Defines how and whether image filters should be rasterised when rendering the image.
member.returns: An containing the rendered graphics objects.
